sections.code:
/* These extra @-moz-document definitions will not be included in the "grunt user"
  * build because Chrome Stylish puts these extra definitions into separate sections
  * with separate regexp/domain definitions.
  * If the css below changes, it will have to be manually updated
  */
/* === StackExchange tweaks === _                 _
  | |_ _ _ _ ___ ___| |_ ___
  |  _| | | | -_| .'| '_|_ -|
  |_| |_____|___|__,|_,_|___|
 */

usercssData.name: Wikipedia Deep Dark Theme
usercssData.description: Dark Wikipedia theme. Get a cleaner, easier-to-read wiki at night to focus on content while browsing a beautiful dark website.

usercssData.name: DuckDuckGo DeepDark
usercssData.description: Light will blind you in your search for answers, dark will make them shine. May the dark be kinder on thine eyes. (DuckDuckGo dark theme)
